ntp-global.description: The node of NTP global configuration.

enable.description: The NTP global enable switch,0 means off,1 means on.

master.description: The NTP server stratum value:the valid range is 1-15,0 means disable master.

poll-interval.description: The NTP poll interval,the range is 4 to 17.

master-mode.description: Configure the working mode of the server, fast means fast mode, slow means slow mode, and the default is slow mode.

md5-strong-password-check.description: The NTP MD5 strong password check status,0 means off,1 means on.

ntp-server.description: The node of NTP server configuration.

ip-address.description: The NTP server IPv4 address.

version.description:
The NTP version number, it can be in the range from 1 to 4. 
The default value is 3.

lock.description: The NTP server lock status.0 means unlock,and 1 means the server is locked.

priority.description: The NTP server priority,the lower value the higher priority.

ntp-ipv4-mng-list.description: The NTP IPv4 MNG server list.

ip-address.description: The NTP server IPv4 address.

The default value is 3.

lock.description: The NTP server lock status.0 means unlock,and 1 means the server is locked.

priority.description: The NTP server priority,the lower value the higher priority.

ntp-authentication.description: The node of NTP authentication configuration.

authenticate.description: The NTP authentication switch,0 means off,1 means on.

ntp-authentication-key.description: The node of NTP authentication key configuration.

ntp-server-with-name.description: The node of NTP server with name configuration.

address.description: The NTP server address(IP address or DNS domain name).

association-type.description: The association type for this NTP server.Default:SERVER.

version.description:
The NTP version number, it can be in the range from 1 to 4. 
The default value is 4.

priority.description: The NTP server priority,the lower value the higher priority.

ntp-monitor-clients.description: The node of monitor clients configured by NTP server.

ipv4-clients.description: The NTP IPv4 monitor clients configuration.

ip-address.description: The NTP monitor client IPv4 address.

offset-threshold.description: The threshold of offset between client and server,the range is 1 to 4294967295 milliseconds.

timeout.description: Timeout interval of monitor client,the range is 1 to 48 hours.

ipv6-clients.description: The NTP IPv6 monitor clients configuration.

ipv6-address.description: The NTP monitor client IPv6 address.

offset-threshold.description: The threshold of offset between client and server,the range is 1 to 4294967295 milliseconds.

timeout.description: Timeout interval of monitor client,the range is 1 to 48 hours.

ipv4-vrf-clients.description: The NTP IPv4 VRF monitor clients configuration.

ipv4-vrf-client.description: The NTP IPv4 VRF monitor client.

ip-address.description: The NTP monitor client IPv4 address.

offset-threshold.description: The threshold of offset between client and server,the range is 1 to 4294967295 milliseconds.

timeout.description: Timeout interval of monitor client,the range is 1 to 48 hours.

ipv6-vrf-clients.description: The NTP IPv6 VRF monitor clients configuration.

ipv6-vrf-client.description: The NTP IPv6 VRF monitor client.

ipv6-address.description: The NTP monitor client IPv6 address.

offset-threshold.description: The threshold of offset between client and server,the range is 1 to 4294967295 milliseconds.

timeout.description: Timeout interval of monitor client,the range is 1 to 48 hours.

ntp-service.description: The node of NTP service switch configuration.

ipv4-service.description: NTP IPv4 service switch,0 means disable,1 means enable.

ipv6-service.description: NTP IPv6 service switch,0 means disable,1 means enable.

current-server.description: The current server IP and VRF name.

source-address.description: The NTP association source IP address.

dest-address.description: The NTP association destination IP address.

if-name.description: The source interface binded by NTP association.

version.description: The NTP version number.

lock.description: The NTP association lock status(prefer flag).

priority.description: The NTP association priority.

reach.description: The NTP association reach flag,0 means unreach.

delay.description: The value of NTP association delay.

offset.description: The value of NTP association offset.

inuse.description: The NTP association use flag,1 means use,0 means unuse.

ntp-monitor-clients.description: The Information of NTP monitor clients.

ip-address.description: The NTP monitor client IPv4 address.

active.description: Whether the monitor client  active,0 means inactive,1 means active.

client-time.description: The time of NTP monitor client.

offset.description: The offset between monitor client and server,the unit is seconds.
